text: illeogalodoe naega malsseum-eulo gyesileul bad-eun geos gaundeseo jug-eun go giwa piwa dwaejigogiwa hananim-ui ileum-eulo dosaldoeji anihan gogileul che-oehagoneun meoggoja haneun jaga meog ji moshadolog geumjidoen geos-eul balgyeonchi anihaessnola geuleona pil-yohayeo ttoneun alji moshayeo geumjidoen geos-eul meog-eoss-eul gyeong-ueneun joeag-i anigeoneul sillo hananim-eun gwan-yong-gwa eunhyelo chungmanhasim ila
